channel.title: v8 on Lectern
channel.description: Recent content in v8 on Lectern

item.title: V8 RISC-V setup
item.description: Introduction Let’s create a root folder to hold the different elements of our build: the riscv toolchain, qemu and its images and the v8 sources. This folder will be called v8_root for the rest of the guide. QEMU installation and setup QEMU Installation: Clone the repository and checkout to the version 5.0: $ git clone git@github.com:qemu/qemu.git $ cd qemu $ git checkout v5.0.0 Install the prerequisites $ sudo apt-get install libglib2.
